channel.title: ~NPC's and Shops!~
channel.description:
Two questions.
1. How do I change the way NPC's face. 2. How do I make a shop?

item.title: ~NPC's and Shops!~
item.dc:creator: @Tredog Tredog
item.description:
@Tredog wrote:

if u have a cfc file go there then there willl be a file called shopsss.

thats were ull edit your shops then right click it then press open with then go to notepad use a code like this to start out with

shop = 2 Pking_Supplies 1 1 391 5000 3751 2000 3749 2000 3753 3000 3755 2000 1127 2000 1079 2000 1093 2000 1163 2000 7535 5000 7460 2000 7461 5000 7462 5000 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 3105 5000 6524 5000 6568 5000 6106 500 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 2436 100 2440 100 2442 100 2434 100 2446 100 3024 100 4835 10000

Then u have to go to autospaw config and right click it do open with then selet nopepad

the code would look like this (hint* u can use these to shops to start out with)

spawn = 2589 0 0 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 pkmaster0036

u make then stand the right way with this code

Dir, 0=West -1=North -2=East -3=South)

Read full topic
